desc: Reserva Dunas Verdes stretches across two kilometers of Indian Ocean coastline, with primary dunes, native bushland, and marine biodiversity at its doorstep.
Untouched primary dunes and native vegetation
Ocean-facing eco-villas and lodge development opportunities
Plans for wildlife reintroduction and animal corridors
Marine protection zone for turtles, rays, and whales
Plastic cleanup and artisanal recycling projects employing locals
